entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -29.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -33.1°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
